title: Schema for adding addition context to detection rules in Indicator SDOs
description: The set of properties that describe a detection rule. For extension-definition--604c32d5-20f5-4f93-8547-e490e512f8d0

extension_type.description: The value of this property MUST be `property-extension`.

status.description: Declares the status of the rule.

license.description: License of the rule according the SPDX ID specification.

fields.description: A list of log fields that could be interesting in further analysis of the event and should be displayed to the analyst.

falsepositives.description: A list of log fields that could be interesting in further analysis of the event and should be displayed to the analyst.

level.description: The level field contains one of five string values. It describes the criticality of a triggered rule.

logsource.description: This section describes the log data on which the detection is meant to be applied to.

category.description: The category value is used to select all log files written by a certain group of products, like firewalls or web server logs.

product.description: The product value is used to select all log outputs of a certain product

service.description: Use the service value to select only a subset of a product's logs, like the sshd

definition.description: The definition can be used to describe the log source, including some information on the log verbosity level or configurations that have to be applied
